description: This header file defines the interface for the 'ethsw_stub_hal' class, which provides RPC methods for Ethernet switch hardware abstraction layer tests. It includes method signatures for getting and setting port configurations, initialization, and retrieving network interface information, as well as class declarations and external dependencies.
external_methods: Json::Value bindAndAddMethod(const Procedure&, pointer to class method)

classes.name: ethsw_stub_hal
classes.description: Class providing RPC interface implementations for Ethernet switch HAL testing. It inherits from RDKTestStubInterface and AbstractServer, and defines methods for various configuration and status retrieval operations.

methods.name: initialize
methods.description: Initializes the RPC server or test environment.

methods.name: cleanup
methods.description: Performs cleanup operations after testing.

methods.name: testmodulepre_requisites
methods.description: Sets up pre-requisites for the test module.

methods.name: testmodulepost_requisites
methods.description: Performs post-test cleanup or configuration.

methods.name: ethsw_stub_hal_Get_Port_Admin_Status
methods.description: Retrieves the administrative status of a specified port.

methods.name: ethsw_stub_hal_Get_Port_Cfg
methods.description: Gets configuration details for a specific port.

methods.name: ethsw_stub_hal_Get_Port_Status
methods.description: Gets the current operational status of a port.

methods.name: ethsw_stub_hal_Init
methods.description: Initializes the Ethernet switch HAL interface.

methods.name: ethsw_stub_hal_LocatePort_By_MacAddress
methods.description: Locates the port corresponding to a given MAC address.

methods.name: ethsw_stub_hal_SetAgingSpeed
methods.description: Sets the aging speed for MAC address table entries.

methods.name: ethsw_stub_hal_SetPortAdminStatus
methods.description: Sets the administrative status (enable/disable) of a port.

methods.name: ethsw_stub_hal_SetPortCfg
methods.description: Sets configuration parameters for a port.

methods.name: ethsw_stub_hal_Get_AssociatedDevice
methods.description: Retrieves devices associated with the switch.

methods.name: ethsw_stub_hal_Get_EthWanInterfaceName
methods.description: Gets the name of the Ethernet WAN interface.

methods.name: ethsw_stub_hal_Get_EthWanEnable
methods.description: Checks if Ethernet WAN is enabled.

methods.name: ethsw_stub_hal_Set_EthWanEnable
methods.description: Enables or disables Ethernet WAN.

methods.name: ethsw_stub_hal_Get_EthWanPort
methods.description: Retrieves the Ethernet WAN port details.

methods.name: ethsw_stub_hal_Set_EthWanPort
methods.description: Sets the Ethernet WAN port.

methods.name: ethsw_stub_hal_Get_EthWanLinkStatus
methods.description: Checks the link status of Ethernet WAN.

methods.name: ethsw_stub_hal(TcpSocketServer & ptrRpcServer)
methods.description: unavailable
